biotools.summary: BELIEF (Biological Expression Language Information Extraction WorkFlow) is a semi-automated workflow for BEL network creation. It embeds an information extraction workflow with state-of-the-art named entity recognition (NER) and relation extraction (RE) methods.

bioschemas.name: BELIEF
bioschemas.summary: BELIEF (Biological Expression Language Information Extraction WorkFlow) is a semi-automated workflow for BEL network creation. It embeds an information extraction workflow with state-of-the-art named entity recognition (NER) and relation extraction (RE) methods.
